Workflow.Name: Review Hub - Launch Excel File
Workflow.Description:
This flow triggers the initial process of the bulk update or create metrics feature of Review Hub by generating an excel file that is suitable for the action the coordinator intends to carry out and returning to the application the link to the excel file.
Flow failure results in the coordinator being unable to utilize the bulk update and create metric feature.
